title: Smart Data Models - DiscExcContIEEEDEC1A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Type DEC1A discontinuous excitation control model that boosts generator excitation to a level higher than that demanded by the voltage regulator and stabilizer immediately following a system fault.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 12.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiscExcContIEEEDEC1A

esc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed change reference ().  Typical Value = 0.0015. Default: 0.0

kan.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Discontinuous controller gain ().  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

ketl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Terminal voltage limiter gain ().  Typical Value = 47. Default: 0.0

tan.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Discontinuous controller time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

tl1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant ().  Typical Value = 0.025. Default: 0

tl2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant ().  Typical Value = 1.25. Default: 0

tw5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. DEC washout time constant ().  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

val.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulator voltage reference ().  Typical Value = 5.5. Default: 0.0

vanmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter for Van (). Default: 0.0

vomax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

vomin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vsmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter ().  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

vsmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter ().  Typical Value = -0.066. Default: 0.0

vtc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Terminal voltage level reference ().  Typical Value = 0.95. Default: 0.0

vtlmt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage reference ().  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

vtm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage limits ().  Typical Value = 1.13. Default: 0.0

vtn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage limits ().  Typical Value = 1.12. Default: 0.0
